about_the_game:
Just Keep Running is a parkour platformer that seamlessly blends fast-paced problem-solving and freerunning player movement.

Designed for Quick Thinkers.


Race against the clock as you navigate intricate test chambers meticulously designed to challenge your quick wit but also your ability to execute your plans swiftly. Hone the power of your freerunning skills to beat your and others' best times.

A Dystopian Voxel Odyssey.


Delve into a thought-provoking narrative that explores superhuman abilities, governmental ethics, and the future of humanity. Just Keep Running offers a unique aesthetic, drawing visual inspiration from well-beloved voxel-based games.

Featuring a Bombastic, Adaptive Soundtrack.


Your adventure features a soundtrack by Victor Ahlin, which dynamically adjusts according to what's happening in the game. And, quite honestly... it kinda slaps.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains strong language and depictions of violence and gunfire, including an instance of pixelated bloodshed.

detailed_description:
Just Keep Running is a parkour platformer that seamlessly blends fast-paced problem-solving and freerunning player movement.

Designed for Quick Thinkers.


Race against the clock as you navigate intricate test chambers meticulously designed to challenge your quick wit but also your ability to execute your plans swiftly. Hone the power of your freerunning skills to beat your and others' best times.

A Dystopian Voxel Odyssey.


Delve into a thought-provoking narrative that explores superhuman abilities, governmental ethics, and the future of humanity. Just Keep Running offers a unique aesthetic, drawing visual inspiration from well-beloved voxel-based games.

Featuring a Bombastic, Adaptive Soundtrack.


Your adventure features a soundtrack by Victor Ahlin, which dynamically adjusts according to what's happening in the game. And, quite honestly... it kinda slaps.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 9100 / AMD Ryzen 3 PRO 2200G
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce MX450 / AMD Radeon 660M
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mojave 10.14+
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel or AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Just Keep Running

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit) or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 9100 / AMD Ryzen 3 PRO 2200G
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce MX450 / AMD Radeon 660M
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Uses Vulkan if DirectX isn't supported. You can choose to use Vulkan during startup.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit) or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 9700 / AMD Ryzen 5 3500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Uses Vulkan if DirectX isn't supported. You can choose to use Vulkan during startup.

short_description: Run, leap, climb, and uncover the truth in an adrenaline-fueled parkour odyssey. Use your superhuman abilities to break free from the same walls you've known for your entire life.
